maximum_consecutive_identical_chars.description: The maximum number of times that a character is allowed to consecutively present in a password.

maximum_password_length.description: The maximum number of characters that a password can contain.

minimum_password_age.description: The minimum period (minutes) after which users are allowed to make a password change.

minimum_password_length.description: The minimum number of characters that a password must contain.

number_of_recent_passwords_disallowed.description: The member of previously used passwords that are not allowed.

password_char_combination.description: The minimum number of character types that a password must contain.

password_not_username_or_invert.description: Whether the password can be the username or the username spelled backwards.
